{"id":1464533099,"question_id":3536,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 1 day","timestamp":1732739831,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1464533099/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Count of Monotonic Pairs II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> arr;\n    int N;\n\n    int memo[2001][1001];\n    const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n    int dp(int i, int last) {\n        if (i >= N)\n            return 1;\n        if (memo[i][last] != -1)\n            return memo[i][last];\n\n        long long sum = 0;\n        for (int j = arr[i]-arr[i-1]+last; j <= arr[i]; j++) \n            sum += dp(i + 1, j) % MOD;\n            \n        memo[i][last] = sum % MOD;\n        return memo[i][last];\n    }\n\n    int countOfPairs(vector<int>& nums) {\n        fill(&memo[0][0], &memo[0][0] + sizeof(memo) / sizeof(memo[0][0]), -1);\n        arr = nums;\n        N = (int)arr.size();\n\n        long long sum = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i <= arr[0]; i++)\n            sum += dp(1, i) % MOD;\n        return sum % MOD;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-count-of-monotonic-pairs-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
